## Annotation Syntax

```
#put id:"node_id", label:"Description", node_type:"process", input:"in.csv", output:"out.csv"
```

| Field | Required | Default | Description |
|-------|----------|---------|-------------|
| `label` | Yes | - | Human-readable name |
| `id` | No | UUID | Unique identifier |
| `node_type` | No | `process` | `input`, `process`, `output`, `decision` |
| `input` | No | - | Comma-separated input files |
| `output` | No | filename | Comma-separated output files |

**Multiline**: End lines with `\` for continuation.

---

## Comment Prefixes by Language

| Prefix | Languages | Extensions |
|--------|-----------|------------|
| `#put` | R, Python, Shell, Julia, Ruby, Perl, YAML, TOML, Rust, Kotlin, C#, Haskell | `.R`, `.py`, `.sh`, `.jl`, `.rb`, `.pl`, `.yaml`, `.toml`, `.rs`, `.kt`, `.cs`, `.hs` |
| `--put` | SQL, Lua | `.sql`, `.lua` |
| `//put` | JavaScript, TypeScript, C, C++, Java, Go, Swift, PHP, Scala, Groovy, D | `.js`, `.ts`, `.c`, `.cpp`, `.java`, `.go`, `.swift`, `.php`, `.scala`, `.groovy`, `.d` |
| `%put` | MATLAB, LaTeX | `.m`, `.tex` |

## Core Functions

| Function | Purpose | Example |
|----------|---------|---------|
| `put()` | Extract annotations | `put("./src/")` |
| `put_diagram()` | Generate Mermaid diagram | `put_diagram(workflow)` |
| `put_auto()` | Auto-detect workflow | `put_auto("./src/")` |
| `put_generate()` | Generate annotation suggestions | `put_generate("./src/")` |
| `put_merge()` | Merge manual + auto | `put_merge("./src/")` |

---

## Common Patterns

```r
workflow <- put("./src/")                        # Scan directory
put_diagram(workflow)                            # Generate diagram
workflow <- put("./", recursive = TRUE)          # Include subdirs
workflow <- put_auto("./src/")                   # Auto-detect (no annotations)
put_diagram(workflow, theme = "dark", direction = "LR")  # Theme + direction
put_diagram(workflow, show_artifacts = FALSE)    # Hide data files
put_diagram(workflow, output = "workflow.md")    # Save to file
put_diagram(workflow, show_source_info = TRUE)   # Show source info
workflow <- put("./", log_level = "DEBUG")       # Debug logging
```

## Diagram Themes

| Theme | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `light` | Bright colors (default) |
| `dark` | Muted colors for dark mode |
| `auto` | GitHub-adaptive |
| `minimal` | Grayscale, print-friendly |
| `github` | Optimized for README files |

**Directions**: `TB` (top-bottom, default), `LR` (left-right), `BT`, `RL`

## Node Types

| Type | Shape | Use For |
|------|-------|---------|
| `input` | Stadium | Data loading, API calls |
| `process` | Rectangle | Transformations, analysis |
| `output` | Stadium | Reports, exports |
| `decision` | Diamond | Conditional logic |
